Our Love Story

A beautiful journey through moments of joy, adventure, and togetherness

Wedding Day Timeline

Join us for a day filled with love, laughter, and celebration

Chinese Tea Ceremony

7:30 AM - 8:30 AM

Traditional Chinese tea ceremony to honor our families and receive blessings from our elders. Private Event, close family only.

Harbour Grand Hong Kong, North Point

Wedding Ceremony

11:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Join us for our wedding ceremony under the love of God. Please arrive 15 minutes early for seating.

Béthanie Church - The Academy's Landmark Heritage Campus

Cocktail Hour

5:30 PM - 8:00 PM

Enjoy cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, and mingling while we take photos. Live music will be provided.

Marina Suite, Aberdeen Marina Club

Reception Dinner

8:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Traditional Chinese bouqet, free flow drinks. Please note your dietary preferences in your RSVP.

Grand Ballroom, Aberdeen Marina Club

Getting There

Everything you need to know about transportation and parking

Parking Information

  • Complimentary Self-parking available at Aberdeen Marina Club only
  • Please let us know your car plate number in advance
  • Béthanie has limited parking spaces, parking is not available for guests.

Shuttle Service

Complimentary shuttle service available:

  • Central MTR Station → Béthanie:
  • Departure at 11:30 AM
  • Aberdeen Marina Club → Central MTR Station:
  • Departure at 10:30 PM, 11:00 PM

MTR

The closest MTR station is Wong Shuk Hang Station (South Island Line) which is about 10 minutes away from Aberdeen Marina Club.
